products.title: Wow Factor Gunmetal Star - Venetian Blind
products.description: Slate grey works effortlessly with a gentle shimmer to create the pretty but utilitarian window covering that is the wow factor in gunmetal star. By blending a high quality, heavy gauge aluminium metal with simple pull-cords to control the light, this blind offers a durable and long-lasting window covering that will retain its quality and style. Hang the gunmetal star in a contemporary dining room, accented by bright silvers, or use in a teenager's room for a fun and exciting shimmering window covering, sat amongst soft greys and dulled whites.

products.title: Wow Factor Silver Star - Venetian Blind
products.description: A pretty, shimmering blind, patterned with a soft glitter, the wow factor in silver star is soft and unobtrusive. The heavy-duty aluminium slats can be adjusted to allow just the right amount of light into the room, all controlled by easy-to-use pull-cords. Pretty pink bedrooms with a light and romantic feel will benefit from the silver star, which will glisten beautifully amongst white walls and hushed rose hues.

products.title: Ecowood Antique Silver Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: The beautifully grey-toned antique silver satin, from the faux wood ecowood range, has a distinctly vintage feel to it. Smooth, with light grain detailing, it offers sleek durability as well as tons of character and aesthetic appeal. Treat your master bedroom to a pretty vintage scheme, settling the antique silver satin against dusky pink walls and furnishing the room with subtle off-whites and dove greys.

products.title: Vista Basic White - Venetian Blind
products.description: For all of the cool, with less of the colour, choose the vista in basic white, a sturdy blind made from heavy gauge aluminium, fully adjustable using the pull-cords so that you can allow more or less light in with ease. Made with perforated slats to let the light gently filter through when open or closed, creating a soft atmosphere. Industrialise your home office, where all the work gets done, by settling the basic white amongst functional white furniture and brushed silver fittings.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe Porcelain Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: There's no colour with quite the versatile sophistication of grey, and the ecowood deluxe range's porcelain grey fine grain doesn't let it down. A realistic grain texture sits across the slats, which offer contemporary clean lines as well as practical durability. Coordinate the porcelain grey fine grain with a rich mauve for a stunningly pretty, yet clean and contemporary, look in the guest bedroom.

products.title: Vista Squirrel Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: The vista squirrel grey brings a light, industrial tone to any room, and with this blind, you can experience light and air whether it's opened or closed. Sturdy aluminium slats are home to perforated holes that let the light flow through whether opened or closed. For a cool, utilitarian look in the kitchen, team the squirrel grey with white tiles and silver accent colours. Or use in the home office for a fresh and airy feel that will soon have you knuckling down to some work.

products.title: Vista Brushed Silver - Venetian Blind
products.description: The vista venetian blind in brushed silver combines sturdy pragmatism with a muted, industrial silver, with perforated holes allowing light to gently filter through. The blind is made from heavy gauge aluminium, making it durable and hardwearing. Team the brushed silver with dark burgundy for a moody, contemporary feel in a modern living room, or use in the hallway or landing to add depth and texture to a fairly neutral area.

products.title: Vista Magnolia - Venetian Blind
products.description: The barely-there hue of the vista in magnolia will update your home using the latest utilitarian trend, where sturdy metals and retro dcor are everywhere. The magnolia has all the freshness of its light shade, with none of the daintiness, using a durable, heavy gauge aluminium to form its narrow, adjustable slats, which are perforated to let the light softly filter through. Place the magnolia in your kitchen, where it is functional and wipe-clean, and group with mocha browns and brushed silvers.

products.title: Vista Black - Venetian Blind
products.description: The vista in black unites a jet black shade with finely perforated aluminium slats, creating a uniquely stylish, satin-finish veneer that lets the light filter through even when closed. To add more light to the room, simply use the pull-cords to tilt or open the slats. Black, of course, matches most shades, and the black will look particularly striking against bold or pastel colours, such as citrus oranges and vibrant reds, or baby blues and pretty pale pinks.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe Brilliant White Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: When you want to discover a timeless look that will add a contemporary finishing touch to any room in your home, brilliant white satin deluxe is the perfect choice for you. Sleek, crisp, and simple; every inch is carefully crafted to enable you to sit back and relax like never before. Transform the living room into the relaxing space you never want to leave by combining brilliant white with charcoal fabrics and a laminate wooden floor.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe Absolute White Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: With a chic, designer aesthetic, the ecowood deluxe's absolute white fine grain displays a snow-toned, grain-textured faux wood, formed skilfully into wide, adjustable slats. Coordinating fittings feature alongside, including woven linen ladder ribbons for ultimate vogue. Craft a warm and welcoming atmosphere in the guest bedroom, placing the absolute white fine grain amidst warm peach walls and matching white furnishings.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe Pistachio Shell Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: With a chic, contemporary look, the ecowood deluxe's pistachio shell fine grain features a pale biscuit, grainy textured faux wood, which easily forms wide, adjustable slats built for ease and speed. Matching fixtures are displayed alongside them, including designer ladder ribbons for ultimate style. Build a colourful and vibrant atmosphere in the hallway, placing the pistachio shell fine grain amidst a bold coral feature wall and white walls to compliment.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe Penthouse Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: If you love rich, biscuity cream tones, then you'll adore the penthouse fine grain from the ecowood deluxe range. Wide slats, with a grain-texture finish, are backed by linen tapes to adjust and tilt the blind, giving a coordinated and designer look. Mix the penthouse fine grain with the lush hues of coffee and chocolate for a classic cookies and cream look. Use this colour scheme to craft and unusual yet striking kitchen look, where cosiness will be the word of the day.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe Blizzard Grey Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: Every bit as luxurious as the range implies, the ecowood deluxe in blizzard grey satin has a sleek, satiny finish, joined by the palest cool grey colouring. Matching fittings, including designer-look ladder ribbons made from high quality linen, enhance this fashionable look, offering a clean and simple aesthetic that you'll love. For a stylishly chic look, pair the blizzard grey satin with a navy blue feature wall and cool white furniture.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe Castle Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: In true ecowood deluxe style, the range's castle grey fine grain offers true designer chic. With a satin-like feel and authentic-style grain detail, this faux wood blind is as gorgeous as it is practical. Designer ribbons adorn the back for easy adjusting. Pair the soft grey of the castle grey fine grain with the bold and stark tone of a pure ribbon red for an unforgettable look in a contemporary dining room.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe Devon Cream Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: For top quality designer vogue, opt for the ecowood deluxe's devon cream fine grain, a thick-slatted venetian blind with a sleek, matt finish and gentle grain detail. Coordinating accessories finish the look, including chic linen ladder tapes that back the blind. For a modern yet classical vibe in a bedroom, sit the devon cream fine grain against a navy blue feature wall. Dress the bed with matching navy bedlinen, in fresh cottons, and adorn with plush, cream chenille cushions.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe Chic Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: The ecowood deluxe in chic grey fine grain brings an air of sophistication wherever it goes - or hangs. A deep shade of grey, it displays a classic wood grain works wonderfully on its faux wood slats. Linen ribbon tapes add a designer touch that just can't be beaten in terms of style. Opt for a bold look in your kitchen by pairing the chic grey fine grain with jet black and ruby red. Choose sleek black and grey units and worktops, adding in red in the form of utensils and crockery, and making silver your accent colour of choice.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe Brilliant White Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: When you trace your eye across brilliant white fine grain deluxe you come to see how the lines gently wind their way across the surface. When you combine this with the purity of the white, you have the perfect way to add a sense of calm and balance to any room you choose. Matching is all about adding colour contrasts that bring both sides of the equation to life. Light wooden floors and dark charcoal fabrics would be inspired choices in the living room.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe Chenille Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: Blend style and class with durable usability with the ecowood deluxe in chenille satin, a designer-style, wooden venetian blind with a matt cream finish. This streamlined piece is backed with matching, vertical ladder tapes to hold and adjust the slats, giving further cohesion and coordination. Construct a modern design scheme in your home office, painting the walls in pale baby blue and matching the carpet to the soothing chenille satin.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe Washed White Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: With a subtle finish that will please even the most discerning eye, washed white satin is the latest deluxe addition to their ever-popular ecowood range. The white is beautifully accented by the grain of the wood and the linen ladders top things off in style. Take your mind back to the relaxing setting of the coast by working in a light stained wood floor and some light blue walls. Perfect for creating the relaxing ambience that will have you switched off from the events of the day the moment you put your key in the door.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe Vanilla Kiss Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: As luxurious as the range's name, the ecowood deluxe in vanilla kiss satin has all the creaminess you could wish for. With a silky smooth texture and classic yet contemporary look, this blind offers as much in the looks department as it does function. Compliment a plum feature wall by hanging the vanilla kiss satin directly onto the colour, toning it down and adding sophistication and depth. Remember to add coordinating ornaments and trinkets to this luxe look, which would be ideal in a master bedroom or living room.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe Vanilla Kiss Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: As sweet and creamy as ice cream, the ecowood deluxe vanilla kiss fine grain is just that a sweeping kiss of yellow creaminess as refreshing as summer. The pretty shade is complimented by the fine grain texture that offers the look and feel of real wood. Surround the vanilla kiss fine grain with equally luxurious shades like rose pinks or lush lavenders for a gorgeously fresh look in a master or guest bedroom.

products.title: Wow Factor Silver Crackle - Venetian Blind
products.description: The brushed silver wow factor in silver crackle is a striking, lightly textured venetian blind, crafted from heavy gauge aluminium, and with a soft, crackled effect on the surface. Use the pull-cord to adjust the slats at ease, allowing as much or as little light as you like to filter through. The attractive industriousness of the silver crackle makes for the perfect accent to a retro kitchen in a monochrome colour scheme.

products.title: Wood Effect Provincial - Venetian Blind
products.description: Pretty and natural, the wood effect's provincial is a must-have for cool sophistication. Made from a wood-effect, heavy gauge aluminium, and formed into slim slats that can be easily adjusted, this blind is both a practical and a stylish choice. Design a light, airy, and natural-feel living room by teaming the provincial with soft creams, dark browns, and matching woods. Simple dcor is all that's required to support the provincial, as its lovely natural feel needs no excess, wherever it's placed.

products.title: Wow Factor Dark Star - Venetian Blind
products.description: The wow factor in dark star unites charcoal grey with a pretty, shimmering silver, on heavy gauge aluminium slats that are easily adjustable to change the light content of the room. These unique features make this blind an obvious choice when choosing a stylish venetian blind. Using the dark star in a teenager's bedroom will provide grown-up style, with the glistening dark silver showing attitude and fun.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe Castle Grey Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: A classic grey shade, the castle grey satin from the ecowood deluxe range is a cool and contemporary venetian blind, carefully crafted from durable faux wood that mimics the real thing perfectly. The look is finished off with coordinating linen ladders for easy adjustments. Grey looks good with anything, but the castle grey satin will look especially striking when used as part of a light and airy, white monochrome colour scheme, perfect for a home office or study.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe Blizzard Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: Build a stunning window arrangement that's both stylish and practical with the ecowood deluxe in blizzard grey fine grain. This sleek collection of quality louvres creates a contemporary venetian blind made from convincing faux wood that's both moisture-resistant and has the ability to be adapted to any surrounding. Craft a chic ambience in your bedroom by hanging the blizzard grey fine grain amidst pastel pink walls and bedlinen.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe Penthouse Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: Make your home feel like the penthouse with the ecowood deluxe in penthouse satin, a faux wood venetian blind offering sleek, wide slats, backed with designer ladder tapes, as well as bags of style. The penthouse satin will team up well with rich teal tones, making the perfect pairing for a bright and cheery bathroom colour scheme. Go for classic white tiles and suite, painting a feature wall in teal and accenting with matching accessories.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe Chenille Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: The designer look of the ecowood deluxe range simply cannot be beaten, and the pale cream chenille fine grain adds a new level of sophistication to the collection. Its classic look belies its hardwearing formula, as it is made from high quality, wood-look pvc for durability and water-resistance. Complement a classic brown and cream colour scheme by surrounding the chenille fine grain with chocolate browns, delicate taupes, and light oatmeals.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe Chic Grey Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: The plush sheen of the ecowood deluxe's chic grey satin is modest and understated, with a polished feel and a smooth finish. Matching designer ladder ribbons, as well as pelmet and bottom rail, make the look whole. Craft a chic and contemporary haven in your master bedroom by blending the chic grey satin with pale, lemon yellow walls and matching grey trim. Include pretty florals featuring coordinating shades of yellow and grey, and don't forget to add plenty of luxe fabrics for extra cosiness.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe Pistachio Shell Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: When it comes to neutrals, there's no beating the soft grey-toned beige of the pistachio shell satin. Hailing from the ecowood deluxe range, this blind comes complete with linen backing ribbon and matching coordinates for a sleek and streamline look. Tone down a rich red feature wall in your living room or dining room by adding the pistachio shell satin to the scheme. Accent with accessories and ornaments in matching cream tones and the occasional splash of red here and there.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe Absolute White Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: As luxurious as its collection suggests, the ecowood deluxe in absolute white satin has a smooth, satiny finish, accompanied by a purest white colouring. Coordinating fixtures, including designer-look linen ladder ribbons, enhance this chic look for a clean and unobstructed aesthetic. For a sleek monochrome look, couple the absolute white satin with dove grey walls and slick, black furniture. Use whites and silvers as accenting colours to finish off the look - one that would be ideal for a home office or studio space.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe Devon Cream Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: For an enchanting window arrangement, choose the ecowood deluxe in devon cream satin for its hardwearing faux wood and quality craftsmanship. This popular choice, with matching supports and decorative, designer detailing, generates a contemporary, venetian-style blind with quick and easy installation and valuable moisture-resistance. Generate a sophisticated restroom with peaceful shading by hanging the devon cream satin against a contemporary, dove grey surrounding.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe Saddle Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: Saddle satin deluxe allows you to take your decor in a new direction whilst staying true to the calm and neutral canvas that you've created for your chosen space. By sitting gently in your window it allows you to celebrate the shimmer of the light as it makes its way into your home. Turn the guest bedroom into the homely space that your family can make their own when they come to visit for the holidays.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe Driftwood Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: With its ash-like looks and grainy texture, the ecowood deluxe in driftwood fine grain has the authentic look and feel of real wood. The faux wood it's made of is high quality, moisture-resistant, and forms sleek, attractive slats, venetian style. Because wood goes with anything, the driftwood fine grain is one of the most versatile blinds around when it comes to looks. Use it with similarly toned woods in a light and airy kitchen, throwing in your favourite colour as an accent.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe Country Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: Gently textured to imitate genuine wood, the ecowood deluxe in country fine grain gives a quality impression of the real thing. All this despite being made from faux wood pvc, which makes it hardwearing and water-resistant. Do as it says on the tin and use the country fine grain as part of a rural, country theme in the kitchen. Opt for rustic shades of terracotta, sage green, and sky blue for the tiling, and choose units in a similar light wood.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe Chateau Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: Plump for all-out vintage style with the ecowood deluxe range's chateau fine grain, a beautifully stained, faux wood blind offering all of the flair and functionality of a venetian. The design is formed from top quality elements, with heavy duty headrails to ensure total security. Bring some authentic french styling to the master bedroom, surrounding the chateau fine grain with varying shades of cream and ivory.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe Espresso Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: Featuring a dark brown colouring and authentic-looking wood grain, the ecowood deluxe's espresso fine grain is an attractive luxury blind. Designer-style woven ladder tapes finish off this handsome look with streamlined chic. Team the brown of the espresso fine grain with a muted terracotta for an unusual yet striking look in a contemporary living room. Go for white walls, adorning them with funky wall prints in matching blacks and burnt oranges.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe Provincial Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: It would be simple to create an elegant dcor with the ecowood deluxe in provincial fine grain, due to its natural, honeyed tone and authentic appearance. The hardwearing and water-resistant faux wood used to form this practical, venetian-style blind produces a pleasant window dressing that is full of hidden benefits. Showcase the provincial fine grain in your lounge with sun-kissed, lumber flooring and toned furnishings to fashion a coordinated arrangement with authentic features.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe Fruitwood Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: Create an authentic window dressing that is long-lasting and water-resistant with the ecowood deluxe in fruitwood fine grain. This quality faux wood prevents both warping and cracking with its durable pvc that looks and feels just like the real thing. It also features top quality components for a contemporary, modern edge, and decorative linen tapes for added designer detail. Craft a well-dressed dcor in the kitchen by including the fruitwood fine grain with walnut cabinets and coordinating lumber worktops.

products.title: Wow Factor River Bed Crackle - Venetian Blind
products.description: The wow factor range is one for anyone who loves sheen and texture around their home, and the river bed crackle offers this in bucketloads, as well as clean, sturdy functionality in the form of hardwearing aluminium slats. Think deep greys, pure whites, and shiny silvers for a monochrome feel in your dining room or home office, all led stylishly by the river bed crackle. Or use in a magnolia utility room to add style and texture to an often forgotten room.

products.title: Wood Effect Natural - Venetian Blind
products.description: The natural is the lightest of their wood effect range, and will match almost any colour scheme. It combines a classically light wood effect with the sturdy toughness of heavy gauge aluminium, resulting in a modern and stylish look. The unobtrusive wood-look of the natural will match almost any colour palette. Use amongst pastels in a light and airy dining room; with forest greens in a statement dining room; or with fuchsia pinks in a teenager's bedroom.

products.title: Wow Factor Powder Crackle - Venetian Blind
products.description: The wow factor in powder crackle unites a shiny, crackled effect with the functionality of heavy duty aluminium slats, making it the ideal option for wipe-clean usability. Use for both privacy and light control purposes, using the adjustable slats to open and close. For a hint of pale grey in the bathroom, combine the powder crackle with blues and whites, as well as silver accents in the form of fixtures and fittings.

products.title: Wood Effect Pecan - Venetian Blind
products.description: The beautiful vibrancy of the wood effect pecan works to create a fresh and natural venetian blind. The easy, wipe-clean slats are made from heavy gauge aluminium, making them both usable and long-lasting. Use the pecan in the home office for an attractive and professional finish, and complement with real walnut woods and soft cream walls. Alternatively, try using a similar colour scheme in the living room, where a soothing, calm feel is crucial for resting and relaxing in peace.

products.title: Wood Effect Walnut - Venetian Blind
products.description: The wood effect walnut is a traditional wood-look brown, formed into slim, tilting slats that are easily adjustable for light and privacy. The heavy gauge aluminium slats provide quality and durability, so you can rest easy knowing that this blind will stand the test of time. Pair the walnut with matching woods, soft creams, and chocolate browns for a luxurious yet functional feel in the living room or dining room.

products.title: Wood Effect Colonial Maple - Venetian Blind
products.description: The modern, chic colonial maple from the wood effect range combines a satin-finish wood effect with hardy aluminium slats, resulting in a natural yet standout window covering that you'll wish you began using long before now. Cook in natural style with the colonial maple creating a contemporary, country vibe in a light and airy kitchen, where it can be gently accented by avocado greens, dusk pinks, or muted sky blues, making for a cosy but light dcor scheme you won't be able to resist.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe Porcelain Grey Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: The subtle dove grey of the porcelain grey satin, borne from the luxe ecowood deluxe range, is a refreshingly cool shade and sits on a smooth, untarnished surface across wide adjustable slats. Coordinating ladder tapes add to the designer feel. Use the porcelain grey satin as a toning accent to stronger shades, such as deep purple or rich red, in the master or guest bedroom. Paint a feature wall in your key colour, adding the blind as a way of breaking up the block colour, and coordinate accessories in matching colours.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe Antique Silver Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: Appropriately named, the ecowood deluxe in antique silver satin offers a pretty vintage aesthetic on a silver-toned faux wood, featuring soft grain detailing and a smooth, flawless finish. These attractive slats can be adjusted with ease, for versatile light and ventilation. Embrace the antique theme of the blind and use it to create a lovely vintage look in your home office. Paint the walls in a chalky duck egg blue and accent with calming, matching greys throughout.

products.title: Origin City Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: City grey combines contemporary design with an urban aesthetic to create a unique visual that takes pride of place in any room in the home. The steely character of the grey is softened by the sleek finishing and smooth surfaces of the wooden slats to create a homely addition that will enhance any space. Origin, city grey - venetian blind city grey combines contemporary design with an urban aesthetic to create a unique visual that takes pride of place in any room in the home.

products.title: Origin Champagne - Venetian Blind
products.description: Origin champagne is the touch of natural luxury that you have been searching for. With every slat created by masters of their craft you have the perfect canvas for the gentle fizzle of this off-white masterpiece. The touch of luxury and effortless style that every home deserves. Origin, champagne - venetian blind origin champagne is the touch of natural luxury that you have been searching for.
